p: Overnight fasted diabetic mice were arranged into 5 groups (each group comprised of 6 mice) at random. Next, mice were given DW, root crude extract of the plant, and GLC according to grouping stated above. BGL was determined prior to the starting of treatment (at 0 hr) as baseline, and then, following treatment at 2 hr, 4 hr, 6 hr, and 8 hr.
